snippet.title: Secret Maryo Chronicles Gameplay
snippet.description:
Secret Maryo Chronicles Gameplay

If you have been flowing me for some time now, you will know how much I love open source games but I have love and hate relationship with this game, in its defence I have not played it a lot when I recorded this video it was the third time i ever played this game. It is hard to overlook the similarities between original Super Mario and this game, a game I grew up with, and most probably if you have not grew up with it you have most probably played it. So you know how great it is, how the character moves, about character inertia, how lovely it looks, how great it sounds. On the other side we have a game that does all of this things differently, the character moment feels totally different, i do not enjoy the art direction, and the music is not that good. sure it is a free and opensource game but I am not crazy about it

This game is available on multiple operating systems, 
You can grab it from their official website
http://www.secretmaryo.org/
please note that music is a separate download 
http://www.secretmaryo.org/index.php?page=game_downloads&sid=?sid=
Catch up with me on Twitter

https://twitter.com/#!/Studio76HD
Take a look at this page

http://digitalstudio7.blogspot.com/
